 2007-06052007-04-26,  ,  FIN,  DFAIT,  ,  , 
ActAppropriation Act No. 3, 1977
PrecisOrder (a) approving the consolidation of and a new repayment schedule for all amounts due in the year 2005 on 23 loans made to the Government of SRI LANKA, (b) approving the consolidation into one payment schedule of all future payments in respect of 22 loans, and (c) designating High Commissioner Angela Bogdans as the person authorized to sign the amendments to the Loan Agreements on behalf of Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
